sections.title: Creating User Profiles
sections.content:
To create a user profile in mParticle:

1. Log in to your mParticle dashboard
2. Navigate to the 'Audience' section
3. Click 'Create Profile'
4. Configure user attributes:
   - Set basic information (name, email, etc.)
   - Add custom attributes as needed
   - Configure identity mappings
5. Set up user identifiers:
   - Customer ID
   - Email
   - Device ID
   - Custom identifiers
6. Configure profile settings:
   - Privacy settings
   - Data retention rules
   - Access controls
7. Save and activate the profile

Ensure all mandatory fields are filled and validate the profile before activation.

sections.title: Profile Management
sections.content:
mParticle user profiles support:

- Real-time profile updates
- Cross-device identity resolution
- Custom attribute management
- Audience segmentation
- Profile merging and deduplication
- Privacy compliance tools
- Profile analytics and reporting
